newsitem.title: UK: HORSE RACING-NEWBURY UNVEILS ARC DE TRIOMPHE TRIAL.
newsitem.headline: HORSE RACING-NEWBURY UNVEILS ARC DE TRIOMPHE TRIAL.

text.p: A new trial for the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe in Paris in October was announced by Newbury Racecourse on Tuesday.
The race will be part of an international meeting on September 18 at the southern England track which will stage five other new races on the same card.
"We believe the timing is perfect," said Newbury clerk of the course Richard Pridham.
The trial, over 11 furlongs (2.2 km), takes place 17 days before the Arc.
